Title: S6 Ep. 234 Fred Rockwell - Founder of Ascent Conference
Description:
Fred Rockwell is the founder and CEO of Ascent Conference and has over 15 years of business experience including live events, media, investment management, and financial services roles.  

Truly an interesting interview when Isabella asked what he learned from a hard life lesson, he shared "Don't be in a hurry." Listen in this week's episode to learn more about Fred while set in the background noise of  New York City. Aside from learning more about our guest, you will also gain insight as to what Fred believe conferences will look like in the future.
